articles.author: Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: France to deliver ‘light tanks’ to Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Emmanuel Macron would be the first leader to send Western-designed armored fighting vehicles to the warzone.
articles.content: PARIS France will deliver “light” battle tanks to Ukraine, President Emmanuel Macron’s office announced Wednesday, which would make it the first country to send such Western-designed armored fighting… [+1563 chars]
